title: Angus Deaton symposium - introduction
abstract: The articles in this Feature are selected from among those presented at a conference held in honour of Angus Deaton in September 2009. The conference brought together current and former colleagues, co-authors and students. These participants had in common their shared admiration of Angus and his contributions to economic
publisher: Wiley on behalf of the Royal Economic Society
